item.title: Tom Lee: Morgan Stanley Survey Shows Increasing Percentage of Non-Owners of Cryptocurrency, Cryptocurrency Still in Early Stage
item.description: On August 24th, Tom Lee stated in a post on the X Platform, "According to Morgan Stanley's survey, the percentage of non-owners of crypto assets is 69% in 2024 and 82% in 2025. This percentage actually shows an increase in 2025, suggesting that we are still in the early stage of the crypto cycle."

item.title: Berachain Co-founder: ICO and Public Sale Will Make a Comeback, Large-scale Airdrops Pose More Harm than Good
item.description: August 24th. Berachain's co-founder Smokey stated that "When there is a larger-scale airdrop, there will be a greater number of potential sellers with no cost basis. Many large Asia-Pacific trading teams often specifically short tokens with airdrops. Additionally, airdropped tokens are easily influenced by the market, and most end up in the hands of insiders. ICOs and public sales are likely to make a significant comeback. For most teams in the future, the most prudent approach is to conduct a very small airdrop (1-2%), while also having a public sale (perhaps accounting for 5-10%)."

item.title: 「Brother Big Brother」 Huang Licheng is long on BTC and YZY, with the overall long position total holding reaching $91.44 million
item.description: On August 24th, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight (accessible via https://app.hyperliquid.xyz/join/NTOD), "Brother Ma" Huang Licheng took a long position on BTC with a leverage of 40 times, holding 75 coins (approximately $8.58 million), with an average opening price of $114,702.1. He also went long on YZY with a leverage of 3 times, holding 150,000 coins ($100,000), with an average opening price of $0.681."Brother Ma" Huang Licheng also holds a long position of 16,100 ETH ($76.78 million), with an average opening price of $4,645.32, and currently has an unrealized gain of $2.03 million. He also holds 136,000 HYPE coins (about $5.98 million), with an average opening price of $43.8, and currently has an unrealized gain of $20,000. The total value of his long positions is $91.44 million.

item.title: A whale withdrew 10,000 ETH from Kraken
item.description: On August 24th, based on the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a whale transferred 10,000 ETH from Kraken. The value of this withdrawal is $47.68 million.

item.title: OKX CEO Star: to Launch $100M X Layer Ecosystem Fund, Supporting Global Builders in the Next Wave of On-Chain Applications
item.description: On August 24th, the CEO of OKX, Star, posted on social media, saying, "The X Layer will center around long-term growth. It will launch a $1 billion X Layer Ecosystem Fund to provide support to global builders in creating the next wave of on-chain applications. Preference will be given to teams that have a long-term perspective and technical prowess instead of short-term profit-driven token projects."

item.title: OKB experiences a short-term surge of over 9%, as OKX CEO Star previously announced the launch of a $1 billion X Layer Ecological Fund.
item.description: On August 24th, based on market data, OKB witnessed a significant surge of over 9% in a short span. It is currently trading at $212.86.Previously reported, OKX CEO Star announced that they will establish a $1 billion X Layer Ecological Fund to provide support to global builders in creating the next wave of on-chain applications.

item.title: 1confirmation Founder: Ethereum's Institutional Holding Structure Healthier Than Bitcoin's
item.description: On August 24th, Nick Tomaino, who is the founder of the crypto venture capital firm 1confirmation, put up a message saying, "The crucial defect of Strategy is that Michael Saylor holds 10% of the company's equity but wields 45% of the voting rights. Meanwhile, the company holds 3.3% of the total Bitcoin supply. He shows up on TV every day as a 'Bitcoin spokesperson.' Clearly, Wall Street doesn't want him to become wealthier."In contrast, Tom Lee's stake is significantly smaller than Michael Saylor's. And companies like SBET, ETHZ, and GAME are making headway without anyone cornering the Ethereum holdings. This is precisely why Wall Street and the public will offer support to ETH in a manner distinct from BTC.

item.title: An whale transferred 12 million BIO to Binance 40 minutes ago, equivalent to around $3.79 million
item.description: On August 24th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a whale address 0xe0ba deposited 12 million BIO tokens (valued at $3.79 million) into Binance 40 minutes ago. Previously, the whale received 4.8 million BIO tokens (worth $1.53 million) from the Vesting Wallet of Bio Protocol.Moreover, 5 months ago, when the price was $0.057, the whale withdrew 15 million BIO tokens from Binance. The current unrealized gain is $3.72 million (+436%).

item.title: A whale is currently 3x long on YZY with a floating profit of $2.12 million.
item.description: On August 24th, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a whale is currently 3 times long in YZY and has a floating profit of $2.12 million.

item.title: El Salvador Continues to DCA into Bitcoin: Accumulated an additional 7 BTC in the past 7 days, increasing total holdings to 6,278.18 BTC
item.description: On August 24th, based on the data from the website of the Salvadoran Ministry of Finance, in the past 7 days, El Salvador has accumulated an extra 7 Bitcoins. As a result, its total Bitcoin holdings have reached 6,278.18 Bitcoins, which is worth more than $719 million.
